biocontainers.name: seqscreen
biocontainers.summary: Seqscreen was created to sensitively assign taxonomic classifications, functional annotations, and biological processes of interest to single, short dna sequences (50bp-1,000bp).

biotools.summary: SeqScreen sensitively assigns taxonomic classifications, functional annotations, and biological processes of interest to short DNA sequences.

bioschemas.name: SeqScreen
bioschemas.summary: SeqScreen sensitively assigns taxonomic classifications, functional annotations, and biological processes of interest to short DNA sequences.
